medium: Color etching, linocut and woodcut on Japan paper
title: The Singing Bridge
marks: Signature, date, number, chop mark Lower center: [working/trial/1979 Steven Sorman]
description: Large square grid partially covered by red rectangle in LL and LRQs; red horizontal and vertical stripes along upper margin; blue horizontal and vertical stripes along bottom margin
